name: Bikini Karate Babes for Mobile Devices
blurb: This humorous and enduring cult classic is coming to iPhones and other mobile devices everywhere.

rewards.reward: [1] Electronic thank you. [2] Electronic delivery of our first series of online trading cards (25 images).
Everything above + [1] Full version of Bikini Karate Babes Mobile, plus 1 extra character.  [2] Emailed high resolution photos from our 2011 and 2012 wall calendars.
Everything above + [1] Digital download of "Bikini Karate Babes" for Windows (requires a free website registration).

Everything above + [1] "Bikini Karate Babes" for Windows DVD. [2] "Bikini Karate Babes 2: Warriors of Elysia" for Windows DVD. [3] "The Warriors Tale" DVD.  [4] "Inside the Bikini" DVD. [5] Emailed images of our 2nd, 3rd, and 4th series of online trading cards.

Everything above + [1] Full version of Bikini Karate Babes mobile (with 3 extra characters).  [2] "Bigger, Badder, Bustier" DVD . [3] "Escape from Exile" DVD. [4] Emailed images of our 5th and 6th series of online trading cards.  -- All incentives (except mobile game) shipped within four weeks of successful funding!  The game ships in November.

Everything above + [1] Given "Special Thanks" in the credits. [2] "BKB2: RAW 1 - Production Footage" DVD. [3] "BKB2: RAW 2 - Studio Footage" DVD. [4] "BKB2: RAW 3 - Rehearsal Footage" DVD. [5] "BKB2: RAW 4 - Audition Footage" DVD. [6] "Bikini Karate Babes soundtrack" audio CD album. [7] "Bikini Karate Babes 2: Warriors of Elysia soundtrack" audio CD album. [8] Special access to our online mobile BKB development forum.  -- All incentives (except mobile game) shipped within four weeks of successful funding!  The game ships in November.

Everything above + [1] Credited as "Associate Producer". [2] "Amazing Aphrodite" DVD. [3] "Pinkies" DVD. [4] Exclusive "Bikini Karate Babes 2013 Wall Calendar" -- All incentives (except mobile game) shipped within four weeks of successful funding!  The game ships in November.

Everything above + [1] "Beta Tester". [2] "One Year Fan Club Membership". [3] "Associate Producer certificate". [4] "Pair of Authentic Bracers". [5] "TienWu workout" DVD. [6] "Aphrodite and Venus" DVD.  -- All incentives (except mobile game) shipped within four weeks of successful funding!  The game ships in November.  The Beta version available prior to that.
Everything in the $140 package (except bracers) + [1] BKB: RAW 6 DVD.  [2] BKB2: RAW 5 DVD.
Everything above (except bracers) + [1] BKB: Raw 1 DVD.  [2] BKB: Raw 2 DVD.  [3] BKB: Raw 3 DVD.  [4] BKB: Raw 4 DVD.  [5] BKB: Raw 5 DVD.

Everything above (except for bracers) + [1] "Become a Playable Bonus Character" (publicly available). -- All incentives (except mobile game) shipped within four weeks of successful funding!  The game ships in November.  The Beta version available prior to that.  Your character will be available to you with the release of the full game, provided you are available for studio production prior to August 2013.

Everything above (except for bracers and the $450 package) + [1] "Become a Playable Bonus Character" (Not publicly distributed). -- All incentives (except mobile game) shipped within four weeks of successful funding!  The game ships in November.  The Beta version available prior to that.  Your character will be available to you with the release of the full game, provided you are available for studio production prior to August 2013.

Everything above (except for bracers and the previous two packages) + [1] Credited as "Executive Producer". [2] "Executive Producer certificate". [3] "IMBD listing as Executive Producer".  [4] "Four Playable Bonus Characters". -- All incentives (except mobile game) shipped within four weeks of successful funding!  The game ships in November.  The Beta version available prior to that. Your characters will be available to you with the release of the full game, provided you are available for studio production prior to August 2013.
